title: Voxiversity IV poll
author: VD
content_html: I’d encourage those who have participated in past Voxiversities or are seriously contemplating taking part in the next one to vote. If you’re not, don’t bother.
content_text: I’d encourage those who have participated in past Voxiversities or are seriously contemplating taking part in the next one to vote.  If you’re not, don’t bother.
